# duration

**Instance Property**

Confidence of the duration if the predicted event occurs.

## Declaration

```swift
let duration: ServicePrediction.Confidence
```

## Accessing prediction confidence scores

- **prediction**: Confidence that the predicted event will occur.
- **startTime**: Confidence of the start time if the predicted event occurs.
- **ServicePrediction.Confidence**: An enumeration of levels of confidence for a prediction or one of its properties.

items.description: Confidence that the predicted event will occur.
items.name: prediction

items.description: Confidence of the start time if the predicted event occurs.
